35 namespace gpstk

38 
39  /* Set acceleration
40  *
41  * @param acceleration Accelerations matrix (3D).
42  */
43  void RK4VehicleModel::setAcceleration( const Matrix<double>& acceleration )
44  {
45 
46  // Set accelerations
47  ax = acceleration(0,0);
48  ay = acceleration(1,0);
49  az = acceleration(2,0);
50 
51  return;
52 
53  } // End of method 'setAcceleration()'
54 
55 
56 
57  /* Set acceleration
58  *
59  * @param accelerationX Acceleration X component.
60  * @param accelerationY Acceleration Y component.
61  * @param accelerationZ Acceleration Z component.
62  */
63  void RK4VehicleModel::setAcceleration( double accelerationX,
64  double accelerationY,
65  double accelerationZ )
66  {
67 
68  // Set accelerations
69  ax = accelerationX;
70  ay = accelerationY;
71  az = accelerationZ;
72 
73  return;
74 
75  } // End of method 'setAcceleration()'

78 
79  /* Implements "derivative()". It is based on accelerations.
80  *
81  * @param time Time step.
82  * @param inState Internal state matrix.
83  * @param inStateDot Derivative of internal state matrix.
84  */
85  Matrix<double>& RK4VehicleModel::derivative( long double time,
86  const Matrix<double>& inState,
87  Matrix<double>& inStateDot )
88  {
89 
90  // Let's insert data related to X coordinates
91  inStateDot(0,0) = inState(1,0); // Set X' = Vx
92  inStateDot(1,0) = ax; // Set Vx' = Ax
93 
94  // Let's insert data related to Y coordinates
95  inStateDot(2,0) = inState(3,0); // Set Y' = Vy
96  inStateDot(3,0) = ay; // Set Vy' = Ay
97 
98  // Let's insert data related to Z coordinates
99  inStateDot(4,0) = inState(5,0); // Set Z' = Vz
100  inStateDot(5,0) = az; // Set Vz' = Az
101 
102  return inStateDot;
103 
104  } // End of method 'RK4VehicleModel::derivative()'
105 
106 
107 } // End of namespace gpstk
